profile.name: Hadi Noori
profile.bio_p1: Specializing in the intersection of algorithmic accountability and institutional policy. Architecting defensible governance frameworks for high-stakes AI deployment, ensuring alignment with emerging global standards (EU AI Act, NIST) while mitigating systemic risks.
profile.bio_p2: Leveraging deep expertise in Information Systems Management to analyze digital transformation failure modes. Operating as a strategic advisor to organizations navigating the 'Black Box' opacity of generative AI and autonomous systems.
